metadata.title: CVE-2021-23017 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A security issue in nginx resolver was identified, which might allow an attacker who is able to forge UDP packets from the DNS server to cause 1-byte memory overwrite, resulting in worker process crash or potential other impact.

advisory.discovered_by: Luis Merino, Markus Vervier, Eric Sesterhenn

criterions.comment: nginx package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.18.0-6ubuntu8.2').
